name: Grim Jumper (Tech Demo)
description:
Hi everyone!

I'm newbie in gamedev so I must beg all of you guys for patience. My "game" is in early pre-pre-pre-alpha. That's only technology demo made in GDevelop 5. Everything in game was invetioned and made by me.

Enjoy maybe.

Controls:
Left and right arrow or a and d - Movement
Down arrow or s or left ctrl - Crouch
Spacebar or up arrow - Jump

Version 0.0.4

  • Added intro animation
  • Added pause
  • Bugs fixed:
    • When press jump while crouching player stayed in crouch state

Version 0.0.3

  • Little improvments in movement based on your feedback
    • Now can you side moving with "a" and "d"
    • Jump can you now with up arrow
    • Crouch is now under down arrow, "s" and ctrl button
  • Added new level
  • Added total score after win game

Version 0.0.2

  • Change in enemy sprite: 
  • Added points system:
    • Player can collect coins
    • Every coin equal 1 point
    • Points are displayed in upper-left corner
  • Change with movement:
    • Cause points system leads to strange problems with old movement system I have been to reorganize him:
      • Player now can't crouching in air
      • Player now can't moving while crouch
  • Version 0.0.1:
    • Basic movement player
    • Random spawning projectiles
    • Basic main menu
    • Backgrounds
    • Win screen with win requirements (Touch white rectangle)
